description: 認識物聯網主角之一Raspberry Pi之構造與功能，並習得利用Raspberry Pi控制周邊感測器之能力。

syllabus.zh:
1.樹梅派編程環境簡介
2.Linux基礎
3.Python基礎
4 GUI編程
5.網路與網頁編程
6.樹梅派Python控制
7.樹梅派感測器的使用
8.樹梅派專案實務
syllabus.en:
1.Configuration for programming on Raspberry Pi
2.Basic of Linux
3.Basic of Python
4.GUI Programming
5.Network Programming
6.Control of Raspberry Pi with Python
7.Sensors Use on Raspberry Pi
8.Raspberry Pi Project Practice

weeklySchedule:
1 Course Overview Formative Assessment (Pre-test)
2 Introduction to Raspberry Pi & Raspberry Pi Pico W Fundamentals of Linux and Commonly Used Commands
3 Programming Language for Raspberry Pi Pico Workshop Python (MicroPython) vs. C/C++ (Arduino IDE)
4 Fundamentals of Raspberry Pi Pico Programming (Part 1)
5 Fundamentals of Raspberry Pi Pico Programming (Part 2)
6 Fundamentals of Raspberry Pi Pico Programming (Part 3)
7 Raspberry Pi Pico I/O Practice (Part 1)
8 Raspberry Pi Pico I/O Practice (Part 2)
9 Midterm Exam/Project
10 Exploring Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) via Tabletop Gaming An Introduction to University Social Responsibility (USR)
11 Internet of Things (IoT) Final Project Discussing the Project and Crafting the Proposal
12 Wireless Communication - WIFI
13 Wireless Communication - BLE or LoRa
14 Node-Red Basics (Part 1)
15 Node-Red Basics (Part 2) Sufficient JavaScript Knowledge for Node-Red
16 Node-Red Basics (Part 3)
17 Confirming the Final Project and Refinement
18 Final Project Demonstration and Presentation Formative Assessment (Post-test)

exams.final: 「微型專題展示」或「上機實作考試」
exams.other: 每個課程單元會有對應的「形成性評量」；微處理器實作

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 了解Raspberry Pi基本構造與功能
學習利用Raspberry Pi控制感測器
完成一件Raspberry Pi實務系統

textbook.title: 自編教材：數位線上教材
